movie.title: All the Wrong Clues for the Right Solution
movie.title_english: All the Wrong Clues for the Right Solution
movie.title_long: All the Wrong Clues for the Right Solution (1981)
movie.description_intro: A private investigator and a police inspector team up to pursue a notorious mobster, who is plotting to milk an old millionaire out of his highly-valued stocks and bonds. Along the way, the investigator crosses paths with a femme fatale and silly gangsters.
movie.description_full: A private investigator and a police inspector team up to pursue a notorious mobster, who is plotting to milk an old millionaire out of his highly-valued stocks and bonds. Along the way, the investigator crosses paths with a femme fatale and silly gangsters.

movies.title: Dak mo mai sing
movies.summary: This action movie unfolds with the story of Bei, a salesman at a workout equipment store, who harbors dreams of adventures. It all starts when on one normal dull day, Bei follows his instincts to trail two suspicious looking men into an alley. When he realizes that these men are robbing a jewelry store, he jumps into action to foil their plans. Soon after Bei meets Liu, a private investigator who convinces Bei that he may be the long-lost son of a rich Korean businessman. In no time, Bei is on his way to fulfill his dreams of adventure and fortune traveling to Korea and even exotic Turkey. As Bei is drawn deeper into the game of cat and mouse, he realizes he has become the key to locating a new, highly addictive narcotic. With an assortment of characters fighting him along the way, will Bei succeed in finding the drug himself?

movies.title: Love Under House Arrest
movies.summary: Renato, an insurer skilled in his work, has always kept his distance from relationships that involve real involvement. When he finds himself giving Anna a lift, who has no doubts about asking him to have sex right away, he doesn't know whether to continue the relationship or consider it a one-time affair. However, when he discovers that she is under house arrest and will have to remain there for a long time, the situation takes on a very interesting dimension in his eyes.

movies.title: In Danger and Dire Distress the Middle of the Road Leads to Death
movies.title_english: In Danger and Dire Distress the Middle of the Road Leads to Death
movies.title_long: In Danger and Dire Distress the Middle of the Road Leads to Death (1974)
movies.summary: Two women with different goals in life are independently out on the town of Frankfurt am Main. One is an offbeat thief and the other an East German spy.
movies.description_full: Two women with different goals in life are independently out on the town of Frankfurt am Main. One is an offbeat thief and the other an East German spy.
movies.synopsis: Two women with different goals in life are independently out on the town of Frankfurt am Main. One is an offbeat thief and the other an East German spy.

movies.title: Schneider vs. Bax
movies.summary: Schneider, a hit man, gets a call from Mertens on the morning of his birthday. He has a rush job for Schneider who refuses it, because it is his birthday and he has promised Lucy, his wife, to help her with the preparations for the dinner party. Mertens insists that it is an important matter. Schneider is told that the target is Ramon Bax, a writer. He lives alone in a secluded place. "It's an easy job. With a little luck you're back home before noon." Schneider accepts the assignment. What seems to be a simple job turns out to be more than expected.
